title: Enhance Ability
content:
Enhance Ability Level 2 Transmutation Spell Bestow a magical enhancement upon an ally. They gain Advantage on Ability Checks with a chosen Ability. Melee Concentration Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Transmutation Spell

Bestow a magical enhancement upon an ally. They gain Advantage on Ability Checks with a chosen Ability.

Melee Concentration

Enhance Ability is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Enhance Ability is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Enhance Ability Information

Description: Bestow a magical enhancement upon an ally. They gain Advantage on Ability Checks with a chosen Ability. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None

Enhance Abilities Possible Effects

Enhance Ability lets you choose between 6 possible effects, each lasting until Long Rest: Bear's Endurance: Gain Advantage on Constitution Checks, and 7 temporary hit points. Cat's Grace: Gain Advantage on Dexterity Checks, and half damage from falling. Bull's Strength: Gain Advantage on Strength Checks, and double Weight Limit. Eagle's Splendour: Gain Advantage on Charisma Checks. Fox's Cunning: Gain Advantage on Intelligence Checks. Owl's Wisdom: Gain Advantage on Wisdom Checks.

How to Acquire Enhance Ability

Enhance Ability can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer Enhance Ability can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer

Enhance Ability Tips & Notes

Upcast: Add an additional target for each spell slot level above the 2nd. Only Ability Checks are affected (includes related skills and initiative). No Attack Rolls or Saving Throws. Best use is Eagle's Splendor for conversations.
